item.title: Storing arbitraty data in the Nitrokey HSM/SmartCard-HSM with Elementary Files (EF)
item.description: This is a guide which shows you how to write small elementary files to a nitrokey HSM. This can be usefull if you want to securely store data protected by a user pin. You can enter the wrong pin only three times, so offline brute forcing is out of the picture.
